thread.title: Introducing: A Grand A Day Giveaway!
thread.title_full: Introducing: A Grand A Day Giveaway! - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Introducing: A Grand A Day Giveaway!
text:
itravel2000
Customers can win $1000 just for booking with itravel2000
TORONTO , Sept. 18, 2015 /CNW/ - Starting today and running until October 25, 2015 , any customers who book a winter vacation package or cruise with itravel2000 will be entered into a daily draw for a chance to win $1,000 cash!
Valid on all new bookings made between Sept. 18 and Oct. 25, 2015 , for travel anytime between Dec. 1, 2015 , and Apr. 30, 2016 , this giveaway contest applies to all pre-packaged vacation and cruise bookings.
It is valid out of any Canadian gateway, for any duration, and to any destination, and there's no minimum price. Customers just book the winter vacation package they want through itravel2000 and they qualify!
The contest is applicable to both online and call-in bookings for vacation packages; for cruise bookings please call 1.866.WOW.DEAL.
Each winner will be contacted by email or phone within two (2) business days of the applicable draw date and a cheque for $1,000 will be mailed to them within 10 business days.
For more information or to book, please call 1.866.WOW.DEAL or visit itravel2000.com .
About itravel2000 â€“ Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Mississauga, ON , itravel2000 is one of Canada's largest independent travel companies and the nation's trusted source in travel. With a mandate to offer clients best-in-class customer service (either online or through its team of Travel Experts), itravel2000 provides Canadians with exceptional value complemented by the broadest range of travel options, including flights, hotels, vacation packages, cruises, and its proprietary travel insurance product GoWise. For more information, visit itravel2000.com
